com.xdatasystem.contactsimporter.hotmail
Class LiveHotmailImporter

java.lang.Object
  com.xdatasystem.contactsimporter.ContactListImporterImpl
      com.xdatasystem.contactsimporter.hotmail.AbstractHotmailImporter
          com.xdatasystem.contactsimporter.hotmail.LiveHotmailImporter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContactListImporter
public class LiveHotmailImporter
extends AbstractHotmailImporter

Implementation of ContactListImporter that retrieves contacts from microsoft's hotmail service. This class only works with the new hotmail version: Hotmail Live. Use the HotmailImporterProxy, the proxy chooses the correct importer.

Author:
Thomas Bernard, Tjerk Wolterink

Constructor Detail

LiveHotmailImporter

public LiveHotmailImporter(java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String password)
Constructs a LiveHotmailImpoter for a specific user. We recommend usage of the ContactListImporterFactory factory object. This decouples instantiation from implementation, and follows the Factory Software Pattern.

Parameters:
username - the hotmail email address of the user
password - the password of the user
